hanzi-su-wiki:
護

Значения

Защищать, охранять

Мнемоника

Элемент справа — в полной форме 矍. Это — сова, птица 隹 с выпученными глазами 目, которую днём можно поймать голыми руками 又 в значении «хватать». Отпугивать криком 言, чтобы не схватили, защищать.

Варианты

护, 䕶
purpleculture_pinyin:
hù
to protect
защищать
rtega_mnemonic:
護護RS
护护		protect, guard, defend, shelter
  • (hand holding an) owl 蒦 and words 言 used for protection and defense
  • ⓢ hand 扌 keeping the door 户 shut in defense
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 护)
Antonyms: 毀
Pictophonetic: 蒦 indicates the sound; 言 (speech) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples: 護理 [ hù lǐ ]: to nurse; to tend and protect
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 言 [ yán ] words, speech; to speak, to say
    • 蒦 [ huò ] to measure; to calculate
heisig_chinese_memo: The sailors tell everyone about their vessel protection services. &nbsp
heisig_constituent: safeguard, say, words, keitai, mouth, radio caroline, flowers, vessels, turkey, crotch
koohiiStory1: Think of the flower-vessels as a the Greenpeace vessel “Arctic Sunrise”, only instead of a rainbow there is a big flower painted on the hull (this will come back in seize (#701) and harvest (#908)). Think of “flower-power” and of the “peace” in “Greenpeace” and it will make some sense hopefully. -- In this kanji, we see an inauguration speech being given before the Greenpeace vessel is set afloat and sent to safeguard our planet.
koohiiStory2: (With sarcasm) A Bush speech telling how all the US vessels are always welcomed, covered with flowers and words of gratitude for safeguarding democracy from the evil doers.
jp_example_words:
介護(かいご): nursing
看護(かんご): nursing, (army) nurse
護衛(ごえい): guard, convoy, escort
弁護(べんご): defense, pleading, advocacy
保護(ほご): care, protection, shelter, guardianship, favor, patronage
養護(ようご): protection, nursing, protective care
看護婦(かんごふ): nurse
WaniKani_Radicals: 言, 艹, 隹, 又
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: They say that flowers held by a turkey on a stool are good to defend yourself with. Even better than a guard dog they say. People are so confused by the turkey sitting on a stool holding flowers that they just lose their will to fight. This turkey is great to defend yourself and your home.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Picture this turkey holding its flowers while sitting on its stool. Hear it gobbling as it defends everything around it with its mere presence.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: The only thing this flower bearing turkey cannot defend against is Godzilla (ご). Godzilla is pretty much undefeatable, especially for a turkey. The turkey is totally unable to defend anything from the mighty Godzilla.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Imagine Godzilla approaching the flower turkey. Hear Godzilla roar as the turkey gobbles in fear before being crushed beneath the massive and scaly foot of Godzilla.
Ru_Radicals: 又 (опять), 艾 (мокса), 言 (слово), 隹 (старая птица)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: you measure (蒦) your words (言) to defend
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: If the lock breaks you have to hold your fingers to the door to protect yourself from an intruder.
humanum_full_description_en:
From " yan " to "蒦" sound. " Guard " means rescue and protection. "Guang Ya. Interpretation II: "Protect, help also." Such as "Historical Records. "Xiao Xiangguo Family": "When the ancestor was a commoner, how many officials would protect the ancestor." "Three Kingdoms. Shu Shu. "Zhao Yun Chuan": "The cloud body embraces the weak son, and protects Mrs. Gan, who is also the queen mother. It is all inevitable."

" Guardian " means surveillance and supervision. Such as "Historical Records. Biography of General Li: "A white horse will protect his soldiers, and Li Guang mounted on horses and a dozen or so horses to shoot and kill General Hu Baima." Zhang Shoujie Zhengyi: "He will ride the white horse and go out of guardianship." "Ban Chao Chuan": "It was when the king Guangde broke through the Shache, and the Xiong Zhangnan Road, and the Huns sent envoys to guard his country."

" Guardian " means commander and commander. Such as "Historical Records. The Biographies of Le Yi: "So Le Yi protected the soldiers of Zhao, Chu, Han, Wei, and Yan in order to defeat the Qi, and break the power to the West." "Han Shu. "Zhang Chen Wang Zhou Biography": "Although he is sick, he is forced to carry the cart, lying down and protecting it, the generals dare not try their best." Ancient Note from Yan Shi: "Guarding means that the generals are supervised.

" Protection " means sheltering and protecting. Such as "Selected Works. Ji Shuye "The Book of Breaking Diplomacy with Shan Juyuan": "Zhongni does not pretend to cover Zixia, and protects its shortcomings." "Book of the Later Han Dynasty. "The Queen's First": "The Ming Dynasty shall be inspected and not protected."

" Guard " also means to cover up or cover up. "Yuefu Poetry Collection. Cross-blown tunes five. "Catch the Song": "The millet is hard to pound and pay the stone mortar, and the bad clothes are hard to protect the Qiaofu."
humanum_short_description_en: From the " word " to the sound of "蒦". " Guard " means rescue and also means surveillance.
humanum_full_description:
從「言」，「蒦」聲。「護」表示救助、保衛。《廣雅．釋詁二》：「護，助也。」如《史記．蕭相國世家》：「高祖為布衣時，何數以吏事護高祖。」《三國志．蜀書．趙雲傳》：「雲身抱弱子，即後主也，保護甘夫人，即後主母也，皆得免難。」

　　「護」表示監視、監督。如《史記．李將軍列傳》：「有白馬將出護其兵，李廣上馬與十餘騎犇射殺胡白馬將。」張守節正義：「其將乘白馬，而出監護也。」《後漢書．班超傳》：「是時于窴王廣德新攻破莎車，遂雄張南道，而匈奴遣使監護其國。」

　　「護」表示總領、統率。如《史記．樂毅列傳》：「樂毅於是并護趙、楚、韓、魏、燕之兵以伐齊，破之濟西。」《漢書．張陳王周傳》：「上雖疾，彊載輜車，臥而護之，諸將不敢不盡力。」顏師古注：「護，謂監領諸將。」

　　「護」表示包庇、袒護。如《文選．嵇叔夜〈與山巨源絕交書〉》：「仲尼不假蓋於子夏，護其短也。」《後漢書．皇后紀上》：「其明加檢敕，勿相容護。」

　　「護」還表示遮蓋、掩飾。《樂府詩集．橫吹曲辭五．捉搦歌》：「粟穀難舂付石臼，弊衣難護付巧婦。」
humanum_short_description: 從「言」，「蒦」聲。「護」表示救助，也表示監視。

從「 言 」，「 蒦 」聲。「 護 」表示救助、保衛。《廣雅．釋詁二》：「護，助也。」如《史記．蕭相國世家》：「高祖為布衣時，何數以吏事護高祖。」《三國志．蜀書．趙雲傳》：「雲身抱弱子，即後主也，保護甘夫人，即後主母也，皆得免難。」 「 護 」表示監視、監督。如《史記．李將軍列傳》：「有白馬將出護其兵，李廣上馬與十餘騎犇射殺胡白馬將。」張守節正義：「其將乘白馬，而出監護也。」《後漢書．班超傳》：「是時于窴王廣德新攻破莎車，遂雄張南道，而匈奴遣使監護其國。」 「 護 」表示總領、統率。如《史記．樂毅列傳》：「樂毅於是并護趙、楚、韓、魏、燕之兵以伐齊，破之濟西。」《漢書．張陳王周傳》：「上雖疾，彊載輜車，臥而護之，諸將不敢不盡力。」顏師古注：「護，謂監領諸將。」 「 護 」表示包庇、袒護。如《文選．嵇叔夜〈與山巨源絕交書〉》：「仲尼不假蓋於子夏，護其短也。」《後漢書．皇后紀上》：「其明加檢敕，勿相容護。」 「 護 」還表示遮蓋、掩飾。《樂府詩集．橫吹曲辭五．捉搦歌》：「粟穀難舂付石臼，弊衣難護付巧婦。」

護字的基本解释

護
hù
见“护”。

護字的汉语字典释义

[①]［hù］
［《廣韻》胡誤切，去暮，匣。］
“护1”的繁体字。
(1)监视；监督。
(2)救助；保护。
(3)引申为谨饬。
(4)护理；守护。
(5)袒护；包庇。
(6)遮蔽；掩盖。
(7)总领；统辖。
(8)占据；侵占。
(9)方言。犹孵。给某种物体以热量，使产生出新的物体来。
(10)古乐曲名。

護字的康熙字典解释

【酉集上】【言字部】　護； 康熙笔画：21； 页码：页1184第17
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?胡故切，音瓠。【說文】救視也。【廣韻】助也。【增韻】擁全之也。【書·畢命序孔傳】成定東周郊境，使有保護。【史記·蕭相國世家】高祖爲布衣時，何數以吏事護高祖。【前漢·西域傳】凡遣使送客者，欲爲防護?害也。【晉書·紀瞻傳】帝使謂瞻曰：卿雖病，但爲朕臥護六軍，所益多矣。　又官名。【前漢·百官公卿表】護軍都尉，秦官。又【西域傳】武帝時，西域內屬者三十六國，置使者校尉領護之，宣帝攺爲都護。【唐書·百官志註】龍朔閒攺左右庶子爲左右中護。　又樂名。【呂覽·古樂篇】湯乃命伊尹作《大護》。【周禮·春官·大司樂賈疏】作大濩。【字彙補】與頀同。　又曲名。【唐書·禮樂志】《丁都護》，晉宋閒曲也。　又草名。【本草綱目】景天一名護火。又薺一名護生草。又【名醫別錄】神護草。李時珍曰：物類志謂之護門草，王筠詩，風驚護門草，卽此也。　又地名。【爾雅·釋地】周有焦護。【郭註】今扶風池陽縣瓠中是也。　又諸羌州名。【唐書·地理志】隴右道有護卬、久護、

["Guangyun" Hu miscut, go to the evening, Xie. ]
Traditional characters for "护1".
(1) Surveillance; supervision.
(2) Rescue; protection.
(3) The extension is Jinfu.
(4) Nursing; guarding.
(5) To be kidding; sheltering.
(6) Cover up; cover up.
(7) The general; govern.
(8) Occupy; occupy.
(9) Dialects. Still hatched. To give heat to a certain object to produce a new object.
(10) The name of the ancient music.

[Youji 1] [Words Department] 　护; Kangxi strokes: 21; Page number: 1184-17
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun]? Hu Gu cut, Yin Hu. [Said the text] Save the sight. [Guang Yun] Help also. 【Zeng Yun】Yong Quan Zhi Ye. 【Book·Bi Ming Xu and Chuan Chuan】Cheng Dingding the suburbs of the Eastern Zhou Dynasty, so that there is protection. [Historical Records·Xiao Xiangguo Family] When the great ancestor was a commoner, how many officials protected the great ancestor. [Pre-Han · Western Regions Biography] Anyone who sends an envoy to send off guests wants to protect themselves from harm. [Jin Book·Ji Zhan Biography] The emperor said Zhan said: Although Qing is ill, he protects the six armies and benefits me much.　Also official name. 【Former Han · Baiguan Gongqing Form】The guardian captain, Qin official. Also [The Legend of the Western Regions] At the time of Emperor Wu, the 36 kingdoms in the Western Regions belonged to the envoys, and the envoys were led and protected by the emperor. [Tang Shu·Hundred Officials' Notes] Long Shuo Xianzhao's concubine is the left and right protector.　Also known as music. [Lv Lan·Guyue Chapter] Tang Nai ordered Yi Yin to write "Da Hu". 【Zhou Li·Chunguan·Da Si Le Jia Shu】makes a big eleven. 【Word Supplement】Same as Kui.　Also the name of the song. Also [Famous Doctors Do Not Record] God protects the grass. hù
вм. 护
Radicals: 言, 艹, 隹, 又  (say, flowers, turkey, stool)
Meaning Mnemonic
They say that flowers held by a turkey on a stool are good to defend yourself with. Even better than a guard dog they say. People are so confused by the turkey sitting on a stool holding flowers that they just lose their will to fight. This turkey is great to defend yourself and your home.
Picture this turkey holding its flowers while sitting on its stool. Hear it gobbling as it defends everything around it with its mere presence.
Reading Mnemonic
The only thing this flower bearing turkey cannot defend against is Godzilla (ご). Godzilla is pretty much undefeatable, especially for a turkey. The turkey is totally unable to defend anything from the mighty Godzilla.
